title: Ever feel like the stock market is rigged for suits, not students?🤔
content:
Hey there!
We’re building an AI tool to help us find and screen IPOs and stocks like pros—no finance degree required.

🤨 Why jump in?
* Help us create a tool that could turn your small investments into big opportunities. 💡
* Takes just a couple of minutes (we’re college kids too—time is 💰💰💰)

🧠 Drop your genius here: 
https://forms.gle/MNsLt7C6KBrzEhFE6

👀 PS: Send this to your friend who treats the market like their side hustle. 😒 Time to level up. ⏫
